<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>91fffea7-21b5-11d8-89de-f2e57024db35#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vallásfejlődés és gondolkodás</string>
            <string language="en">The Development of religion and thinking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Entwicklung der Religion und des Denkens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement de la religion et de la pensée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento da religião e de pensar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo della religione e di pensare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάπτυξη της θρησκείας και σκέψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo de la religión y del pensamiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hinduizmus és az ind gondolkodás bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">The demonstration of Hindu and Indian thinking</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Az Európán kívüli világ,  India,  szokás,  tradíció,  </string>
            <string language="en">the World outside Europe, India, custom, tradition</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Demonstration des hinduistischen und indischen
Denkens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La démonstration de la pensée indoue et 
indienne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A demonstração de pensar hindu e indian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La dimostrazione di pensare indù ed indiano</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδειξη της ινδής και ινδικής σκέψης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La demostración del pensamiento hindú e indio</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Weltaußenseite Europa, Indien, Gewohnheit, 
Tradition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">monde extérieur l'Europe, Inde, coutume, tradition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a parte externa de mundo Europa, India, costume, 
tradição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la parte esterna di mondo Europa, India, abitudine, 
tradizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το παγκόσμιο εξωτερικό Ευρώπη, Ινδία, συνήθεια, παράδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el exterior de mundo Europa, la India, costumbre, 
tradición</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

fn:

    </metadata>
  </description>
